Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers can be slow to respond, and can misinterpret questions when asked the first time. It's faster to ask Ai and then if it misinterprets modify and ask again until satisfactory answer. As email chains with teachers are so slow.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Ai generally doesn't praise what is done well and just answers the questions. Teachers can make you feel more knowledgeable.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Gen Ai can go more in depth, however teachers can bring up other things you need to know that weren't part of the original question to help.
